attributes.action: instruct the enviroment agency to keep open the rivers for coarse fishing all the year round
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the out dated legislation on the close season for fishing rivers for non- migrationary fish we call upon the government to scrap this out dated law. To help protect fish stocks against illegal poachers on our rivers by having more anglers on the bank, also to alleviate the financial problems facing fishing tackle manufacturers & retail outlets in these difficult economic times.
